CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper February 8, 1947, pg. 16, reads: "Peabody Graduates - This group of progressive students were among the many graduates who received their diplomas at the Soldiers and Sailors Hall during the recent commencement exercises. Left to right are, Albert Conton, Edna Walker, Glendora Atkinson, Almone Stevens, George Dillard, Terry Bruce, Mark Campbell, Charles Jr., and Luis Thornton Jr. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Peabody High School graduates including Albert Conton, Edna Walker, Glendora Atkinson, Almone Stevens, George Dillard, Terry Bruce, Mark Campbell, Charles Jr., and Luis Thornton Jr. posed in Soldiers and Sailors Memorial Hall during graduation ceremonies
